original_text: “On the fifteenth day of the seventh month, when you have gathered in the produce of the land, you shall celebrate the feast of the Lord seven days. On the first day shall be a solemn rest, and on the eighth day shall be a solemn rest.
korean_text: 너희가 토지 소산 거두기를 마치거든 일곱째 달 열닷샛날부터 이레 동안 여호와의 절기를 지키되 첫 날에도 안식하고 여덟째 날에도 안식할 것이요

sentences.original_text: On the fifteenth day of the seventh month,
when you have gathered in the produce of the land,
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 땅의 소산을 거두어 들인 후에,

sentences.original_text: you shall celebrate the feast of the Lord seven days.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 칠 일 동안 주의 절기를 지켜야 하느니라.

sentences.original_text: On the first day shall be a solemn rest,
and on the eighth day shall be a solemn rest.
